title: Triple 5 Base Coat - Nail Treatment; Non-Toxic, Vegan, and Cruelty-Free (#19628)
description: Nourishing, Hydrating, Revitalizing Base Coat that Hardens Nails and Stimulates Growth. Instructions for Use: *As a Treatment: Apply two coats, twice a week to increase each of the 5 Benefits.*As a Base Coat: Apply one coat under your favorite Karma Organic Nail Polish.
